required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Mitoxantrone Hydrochloride Liposome Injection in the Treatment of Advanced Gastric Carcinoma
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Open-label, Single-arm, Phase Ib Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of Mitoxantrone Hydrochloride Liposome Injection in Subjects With Advanced Gastric Carcinoma

lead_sponsor.agency: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a multicenter, open-label, single-arm, phase Ib study to evaluate the safety and efficacy of Mitoxantrone Hydrochloride Liposome in subjects with advanced gastric carcinoma.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a multicenter, open-label, single-arm, phase Ib study to evaluate the safety and efficacy of Mitoxantrone Hydrochloride Liposome in subjects with advanced gastric carcinoma. At least 30 subjects will be recruited in this study. The subjects will receive Mitoxantrone Hydrochloride Liposome 20 mg/m2 by an intravenous infusion (IV), every 21 days (q3w, 1 cycle). All patients will receive the treatment until disease progression, intolerable toxic reaction, death, or withdrawal by investigator or patient decision (a maximum of 8 cycles).

primary_outcome.time_frame: From the initiation of the first dose to 28 days after the last dose, assessed up to 36 months
primary_outcome.description: The incidence and severity of AEs, abnormalities in physical exams, vital sign assessments, clinical laboratory assessments, ultrasonic cardiograms (UCGs) and electrocardiographs (ECGs).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the enrollment to the final documentation of response of the last subject (assessed up to 36 months)
secondary_outcome.description: To investigate the preliminary antitumor efficacy

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the enrollment to death, lost to follow-up, withdrawal, or study end, whichever occurred first, assessed up to 36 months
secondary_outcome.description: To investigate the preliminary antitumor efficacy

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the enrollment to the final documentation of response of the last subject (assessed up to 36 months)
secondary_outcome.description: To investigate the preliminary antitumor efficacy

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the enrollment to death, lost to follow-up, withdrawal, or study end, whichever occurred first, assessed up to 36 months
secondary_outcome.description: To investigate the preliminary antitumor efficacy

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the enrollment to death, lost to follow-up, withdrawal, or study end, whichever occurred first, assessed up to 36 months
secondary_outcome.description: To investigate the preliminary antitumor efficacy

arm_group.description: Subjects with advanced gastric carcinoma will receive 20mg/m2Mitoxantrone Hydrochloride Liposome every 21 days (a cycle) for a maximum of 8 cycles.

intervention.description: All subjects will receive Mitoxantrone Hydrochloride Liposome 20 mg/m2, IV, on day 1 of each 21-day cycle (q3w).

overall_official.affiliation: Cancer Hospital of The University of Chinese Academy of Science

facility.name: Beijing Luhe Hospital Capital Medical University
The Fourth Hospital of Hebei Medical University and Hebei Cancer Hospital
